page.title: 14CLUBS ORGANISATIONS 1
page.content: {COWLING YOUTH CLUB The Youth Club meets in the Village Institute on Wednesday evening at 7-30p.m.Membership starts at 11 years old.The Club organises trips out,and also has discos every three weeks. {COWLING CUBS AND SCOUTS The cubs meet on Wednesdays at 4-30 p.m.They are Junior Scouts and start at 8 years old.The Scouts meet on Thursdays at 7-30 p.m.Both sections have an annual camp,and the Scouts also take part in out-door pursuits such as Canoeing,rock climbing and sailing. {BROWNIES AND GUIDES Brownies meet on Tuesdays at 3-45 p.m. Guides meet each Friday at 7-0 p.m. Girls start Brownies when they are 7 years old and Guides when they are 10 years old.Both Brownies and Guides take part in outdoor activities.
